price: 44. Kasi topesaki ba oyo mpe batata na bango bisengo ya ntango шоке kino mibu na bango mikoma ebele. Boye bazali kornona te ete tozali kokutola mabele bangambo na yango nyoso? Boye bakanisi ete bakolonga?
arabic: بَلۡ مَتَّعۡنَا هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ وَءَابَآءَهُمۡ حَتَّىٰ طَالَ عَلَيۡهِمُ ٱلۡعُمُرُۗ أَفَلَا يَرَوۡنَ أَنَّا نَأۡتِي ٱلۡأَرۡضَ نَنقُصُهَا مِنۡ أَطۡرَافِهَآۚ أَفَهُمُ ٱلۡغَٰلِبُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: bal mattaʿnā hāulāi waābāahum ḥattā ṭāla ʿalayhimu al-ʿumuru afalā yarawna annā natī al-arḍa nanquṣuhā min aṭrāfihā afahumu al-ghālibūna
